ProductInfo.Features:
The panel on this LFD is much brighter than conventional screens and delivers excellent visibility, even under the brightest lighting conditions, so images are more vivid
Utilizes innovative technology that improves dissipation while lowering internal temperatures, allowing you to run the LFD 24 hours a day over longer periods, reducing costly servicing and maintenance
New panel coating allow everybody to see your message clearly, even those earing polarized sunglasses
Slim bezel of just 12mm removes any distractions from your sight to provide a greater surface area, which can be useful when creating a video wall in a shop window
The rich color and dramatic depth of detail contained in the images provides the perfect platform for a high visibility, high impact digital display
ProductInfo.Name: SL46B 46" 1920 x 1080 4000:1 High Brightness Professional LCD Display
